content: मठः, --ठं [मठत्यत्र मठ् घञर्थे क] {@--1@} The hut of an ascetic, a small cell or room. {@--2@} A monastery, convent. {@--3@} A seminary, college, place of learning. {@--4@} A temple. {@--5@} A cart drawn by oxen. --ठी {@--1@} A cell. {@--2@} A cloister, convent.
